title: Shame

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose to Hide as a certain role. You appear as that role if investigated or if you die tonight. 3 uses.
- At night, choose a player to Shame as a certain role. They will appear as that role if investigated or if they die tonight. 1 use.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - While you control The Psychopath, you may choose a role to appear as, and you may choose a role to frame your victim as.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Ensure only you and your emotions remain.

desc:
Post 5161
*Feel guilt. You are in the wrong.*
